title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, August 22, 2020
description: It's the birthday of the witty Dorothy Parker (1893), who was kicked out of various institutions for offending people, and who left her estate to Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of the witty Dorothy Parker (1893), who was kicked out of various institutions for offending people, and who left her estate to Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
